name: xatu
description: xatu is an gui wrapper for making http requests
readme: # xatu xatu is an gui wrapper for making http requests build with [electron](http://electron.atom.io/) and [angularjs](https://angularjs.org/) ## HOW TO RUN ```bash # first install electron globally npm install electron-prebuilt -g # clone this project git clone git@github.com:vieiralucas/xatu.git # step into it's folder cd xatu # run electron against it electron . ``` ###Currently it looks like this ![](http://i.imgur.com/QV4ZzKY.png) ###TODO - [x] Support Headers - [ ] Support payload - [ ] Write unit tests
